Message: Today I am feeling tired and I am not in the mood to train.

It's completely natural to have off days, my friend. But remember, every great athlete has encountered fatigue, yet they pushed through it. Let's focus on how much better you'll feel after overcoming this slump with our routine. Your body may resist, but your future self will thank
Today is a good day, but I dont think that I will manage to train for marathon as I would like to.

Persevere despite the doubts, for they are often our greatest teachers. Don't aim for a 'perfect' training session today, just give it your best effort, one step at a time. Every stride counts towards your marathon goal. Embrace the challenge, let's make progress together.
Today I am sad and I dont know if training could help me get better.

Moods ebb and flow, and physical activity can indeed be a powerful ally in uplifting spirits. While it might seem counterintuitive, sometimes pushing through discomfort brings unexpected rewards. Let's channel this emotion into determination, and see what we can accomplish today. You may find solace
